sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT course.course_name, teacher.real_name, enroll.student_id FROM course JOIN course_class ON course.id = course_class.course_id JOIN teacher ON course_class.teacher_id = teacher.id JOIN enroll ON course_class.id = enroll.course_class_id WHERE course_class.term = '2025-2026-1' AND enroll.status = '已选中' AND course.is_deleted = 0 AND course_class.is_deleted = 0 AND teacher.is_deleted = 0 AND enroll.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.course_name, base.real_name, COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM base GROUP BY base.course_name, base.real_name ORDER BY base.course_name

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“学期（如 2025-2026-1）”精确匹配
